subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The crowning moment in the Nets' victory over the Pacers was a spectacular dunk by Vince Carter that gave the Nets a 5-point lead with 29 seconds to play.
snippet: The crowning moment in the Nets' victory over the Pacers was a spectacular dunk by Vince Carter that gave the Nets a 5-point lead with 29 seconds to play.
